text: Henrique Luís (halsa[]iscte.iul) Maria Ribeiro (mcroo2[]iscte-iul.pt) Nelson Jesus (nelson_carvalho_jesus[]iscte-iul.pt) Pedro Ferreira (pvfaa[]iscte-iul.pt) Telma Garção (telma_garcao[]iscte-iul.pt] | goal YABPstat open specialized public (undergraduation students, data-journalists, teachers, investigators…) BPstat API gather data 300 000 series.

title: YABPstat: Yet Another BPstat
text: Full documentation website : https://NCdJ.github.io/yabpstat

title: YABPstat: Yet Another BPstat
text: Using YABPstat «ya_search» get results query “ihpc” (Harmonised index consumer prices), returning results portuguese language. Using YABPstat «ya_info_serie()» plot serie BPstat english language. Using YABPstat «ya_info_serie()» view data BPstat serie table format english language. Using YABPstat «ya_info_serie()» use data BPstat serie dataframe format use analysis reuse.
code: ## using search ya_search(query = "ihpc", lang = "PT") ## using info serie for plotting  ya_info_serie(series_id = 12561507, operation = "P", lang = "EN") ## using info serie for plotting  ya_info_serie(series_id = 12561507, operation = "T", lang = "EN") ## using info serie as a dataframe for reuse ya_info_serie(series_id = 12561507, operation = "Df")

title: Title: ya_get_domain() — ya_get_domain
text: Description: function gathers information BPstat domains makes visible user table format better visualization comprehension. returned fields : ID - unique ID domain BPstat structure identification. Parent ID - ID parent section (none top level domain) Order - order displayed BPstat theme organization Label - label domain Short label - Short label domain Description - domain description series - domain series (True , False ) Last update - Last date domain updated Number series - Number series domain Number datasets - Number datasets domain Domain URL - Uniform Resource Location domain BPstat Dataset URL - Uniform Resource Location dataset BPstat Dimension URL - Uniform Resource Location dimension BPstat

title: Title: ya_get_domain() — ya_get_domain
text: lang string represents languages supported BPstat API. Currently uses "PT" "EN". Defaults "EN"

title: Title: ya_get_domain() — ya_get_domain
text: DT table RStudio viewer

title: Title: ya_info_serie() — ya_info_serie
text: Description: function allows user plot, see table reuse context, data determined BPstat serie ID.

title: Title: ya_info_serie() — ya_info_serie
text: series_id serie ID BPstat. Defaults 0 (zero) operation string length 1 (one), representing following operations: P - plot T - table Df - dataframe lang string represents languages supported BPstat API. Currently uses "PT" "EN". Defaults "EN"

title: Title: ya_info_serie() — ya_info_serie
text: user choice can plot, table tibble analysis

title: Title: ya_my_favourites() — ya_my_favourites
text: series_id serie ID BPstat. Defaults 0 (zero) operation string length 1 (one), representing following operations: - add D - delete V - view lang string represents languages supported BPstat API. Currently uses "PT" "EN". Defaults "EN"
